data.title: Sessions
data.meta_description: Explore 100+ sessions across 3 epic days. Designed to match your learning style and expertise, discover new ideas, level up your skills, and get inspired.
data.text:
A structured Confluence instance suggests it will do a good job of navigating your audience to key information, but how can you be sure? What about a super clear and aligned journey that guides users effortlessly through your content? We reveal an entirely fresh approach to Confluence; an intuitive method that boosts user experience and engagement.

Key Takeaways:

How Confluence is typically structured and what this means for user navigation

A new way of navigating Confluence using decision-trees

Exploring popular use-cases: from onboarding and new starters, to runbooks and agency scripts

Ever heard of a career strategist? Indeed career strategists have the resources, tools and expertise to help job seekers pursue the jobs and careers they want. Join Indeed’s career strategists live for a totally open Q&A session — bring any burning question you’ve had about your career, and Indeed will help with guidance!

Key takeaways:

• Ask Indeed career strategists any question

• Learn from audience questions and Indeed career strategists' advice

• Kick off your expo floor experience with a focus on you and your career

For our customer, a major auto manufacturer, the journey to Confluence Cloud offered a new world of collaboration, but also a chance to start fresh. When it came time to assess their Marketplace apps, only one app made the cut: draw.io. You’ll learn what they prioritized in their cloud transformation, and how they determined which app they couldn't live without.

Key Takeaways:

Tips for planning a smooth Cloud migration

What steps to take when assessing apps for migration

Join Mike Cannon-Brookes, Atlassian Co-Founder & Co-CEO, Zanny Minton Beddoes, Editor-in-chief of The Economist, and Dr. Fei-Fei Li, a leading expert in AI, for an engaging discussion on the exciting potential of Artificial Intelligence. This panel will delve into ways to accelerate the adoption of AI to tackle global challenges and promote accelerated business growth.

Hear expert opinions on how markets, governments, public institutions, and society should collaborate to create an environment that enables AI to flourish while aligning with societal values. Gain valuable insights into how business leaders should plan for the impact of AI on jobs, workforce productivity, and brand trust. Discover the changes in tools, processes, and skills needed to fully embrace AI and revolutionize the way we work. Don’t miss out on this captivating conversation that underscores the importance of working together to shape a future where AI serves humanity both individually and collectively. This event is a must for anyone curious about the future of AI and its implications for society, government, and business.

Think you know Atlassian? Think you know all things teamwork? Prove it! Join Atlassian Modern Work Coach Mark Cruth for a rousing round of trivia in the style of Jeopardy — with a focus on building healthy teams.

Key takeaways:

• Join in on the fun of live teamwork trivia!

• Test your Atlassian knowledge — and your knowledge about team health best practices

We all face the challenge of making decisions with uncertain outcomes with past investments and strategies behind us that might have been out of our control.

This session will showcase how Tempo’s solutions can help you feel more confident with all your strategic decisions and better navigate the changes and challenges of the modern workplace.

Key Takeaways:

Industry top tips for navigating product development challenges successfully.

How to enhance your processes by integrating Tempo's apps with the Atlassian stack.

Transform your decision-making with a data-driven approach designed for achieving top-tier business outcomes.

How’s work? There’s a lot going on, isn’t there. Your teams are irreversibly distributed. AI has finally arrived — with all its promise, and noise. Business complexity is piling up, but good luck moving any faster through all those work silos.

We think technology should make this easier, not harder. Join Mike Cannon-Brookes, Scott Farquhar & Anu Bharadwaj to hear how Atlassian will power the teams of the future to make the impossible, possible.

Ready to earn Atlassian’s global recognition and boost your career? Hear from Atlassian certified professionals who have studied for—and passed—an Atlassian certification. Find out how they did it and what it’s done for their career. Join to learn how to get started on your first Atlassian certification!

Key takeaways:

• How to prepare for Atlassian certification

• How to know which Atlassian certification is right for you and your career

• How being Atlassian certified has changed the careers of our panelists

Today’s workers are plagued by back-to-back meetings, overflowing inboxes, and minimal clarity on how to drive projects forward. Do you experience these pain points within your team? In this session, you’ll learn how to disrupt your workday and drive forward the most important work more effectively by unleashing the power of Atlassian’s suite of tools, including:

Tracking progress against company and project goals with Atlas

Running better meetings with Trello and Confluence

Communicating your message (and saving your calendar) with Loom

Learn from Indeed career strategists how to take the next step in your career in one of three mini sessions. Get 8 career management tips, tips on how to present yourself on paper to stand out to hiring managers and get your foot in the door, and learn the four questions you must be able to answer to ace your interviews and show why you should be hired.

Key takeaways:

• Learn key overall career management tips

• Learn resume writing skills

• Learn how to best prepare for an interview

Setting up a new service management solution should be speedy! Get a firsthand look at how to get up and running, fast. In this rapid-fire session, our product expert will share ten tips for setting up Jira Service Management in a flash while our Atlassian Community leaders compete to see who can build a working service portal first.

Key takeaways:

Learn how to get started in Jira Service Management ASAP with ten tips and "real talk" advice to help avoid common onboarding pitfalls

Understand how and when to leverage templates (for projects, assets, request types), how to get started with automation, and best practices for setting up your help center

Cheer on Atlassian Community leaders as they compete to set up Jira Service Management fastest — and see who takes first place

Project management doesn't need to give you a headache to be effective. Simplify and collaborate across teams by using Jira and Confluence for marketing, sales, or just about any program.

Want to see how we do it? In this session, marketing program managers from Atlassian will show you how they get work cross-functional work across the finish line with Jira, Confluence, and more.

The pandemic accelerated the world of work by decades, so why are we holding onto unproductive meetings like it’s 1999? It’s time we collaborate the modern way.

During this session, learn what good collaboration looks like in a digital-first world and leave with three hacks that will transform how you work tomorrow. Collaborate smarter, not harder!

When Reddit realized their company’s work was breaking off into a million branches, they committed to finding a working method that worked for all. In this session, discover the ways that Atlassian’s work management suite allowed Reddit to build bridges where once there were only walls. You will learn how Reddit journeyed through the harsh realities required to enable enterprise-wide collaboration, ultimately discovering massive gains in efficiency, innovation, and employee satisfaction.

Key takeaways:

How to get teams to buy-in on a common way of working

How to navigate push-back as it arises

Benefits of consolidating an expansion tool stack onto Atlassian

Atlassian’s mission is to unleash the potential of every team, and we believe the future of teams will be a partnership between humans and artificial intelligence (AI).

Last year, we launched a set of powerful AI-assisted capabilities. Today, we are taking the next step. Let us show you how we can transform teamwork with the power of AI-human collaboration. Don't wait for the future – embrace it with Atlassian Intelligence.

Key takeaways:

Learn about our fundamental beliefs on how AI is set to revolutionize the dynamics of teamwork.

See how seamlessly AI is integrated into our products and solutions.

Discover the latest AI use cases and their potential in empowering your teams.

Engineering leaders say their organizations struggle with productivity, collaboration, and tracking progress against goals. Some try to fix it by adding more dashboards, making strict rules, and asking for more reports. But just doing more doesn't solve the real issues developers face.

Let’s build a culture that empowers developers to do the right things and starts a dev-olution. Join Sven and hear how empowered teams build trustful relationships, work asynchronously and synchronously, use data smartly, care about outcomes, stay curious, and always try new things. More importantly, you will learn how to establish such a culture evolutionarily.

Empowering your engineers will amplify developer joy and supercharge your development effectiveness.

Key takeaways:

Empowering developers is the key to effectiveness

Changing the way we work needs to be an evolution (not a transformation)

Atlassian Community Leaders come together to discuss how they work towards Atlassian Community’s shared mission to build relationships and expand Atlassian product knowledge. Community Leaders are stewards of this movement: Join to find out how you can get involved and change your career trajectory—while making some friends along the way!

Key takeaways:

• Learn about the different types of Atlassian Community Leaders

• Learn what it takes to be a Community Leader

• Learn how being a Community Leader can change your career trajectory

At Atlassian, we believe that what is impossible alone is possible together. Our company began as a team of two co-creators and we're thrilled to highlight another team of two we admire, Jason Sudeikis and Brendan Hunt, the co-creators of Ted Lasso, in our Impossible Alone keynote.

In this uplifting conversation, discover how Sudeikis, the multifaceted writer, executive producer, and actor who played Ted Lasso, along with Brendan Hunt, who doubles as co-creator and writer while portraying Coach Beard, delve into their collaborative journey that spans multiple decades. They will discuss the intricacies of their creative process and reveal personal revelations about themselves and their dynamic partnership. Expect heartwarming anecdotes of their first partnerships on Boom Chicago and a Ted Lasso soccer commercial that inspired the show and explore how cultivating a culture of openness, humor, and kindness has been key to their remarkable collaboration.

We’ve waxed lyrical about the future so much, we’ve all become paralysed. Let’s instead form a do-ocracy movement around MODERN work and find things today that build a better future.

I’m not saying kill your dreams…just make them more realistic by taking ownership and action of the steps today to create that better future. We won’t look back and say “AI, crypto and 5G really saved us as a society” so let’s get on with creating our future on purpose, and not by accident.

This session will be an activation, provocation, and commencement of a movement. No bs thought leadership. Let’s do this!

Enterprise agility — it’s not just a fad, and it’s not just adopting agile frameworks. It’s the driving force behind an organization’s ability to adapt. It transforms data into actionable insights that guide decision making and validate ROI. So what is it exactly? And how is Atlassian investing to make sure it’s not just a buzzword? Join us and get in the know.

Key takeaways:

Learn what enterprise agility really means, why it matters, and how it can take your organization to the next level.

Uncover the secret to unlocking insights and value from data across your enterprise.

Get a first-look into the future of Atlassian’s enterprise agility capabilities.

Learn from Atlassian Creators about how you can reap benefits from championing your favorite products. You've seen them in blogs, on YouTube, and on LinkedIn. Now is your chance to ask #AtlassianCreators your questions! Ever wonder what our day looks like or how we do what we do? Ask away!

Key takeaways:

• How being Creators has benefited our careers

• How to get started on being a Creator

• Different ways you can contribute to the Atlassian Ecosystem

• Community and brand benefits from user-generated content

Have you ever been part of a large cross-functional project that has gone off track? Do you ever get lost working across multiple tools, unsure where to go to find things?

The workplace is becoming ever more chaotic with the number and complexity of the contexts you have to work in scattered across multiple tools and teams. It can be hard to find and prioritise your work and it’s even harder to connect the dots between the work, the goals it contributes towards and the teams doing the work.

Join this session if you want to find the signal amidst the noise and collaborate better than ever.

Here’s what’s in store for you:

Deep dive into the challenges of collaboration in modern work.

Learn about our new cross-product collaboration experiences.

Gain insights on what makes for healthy and effective collaboration.

Despite over 329 billion gigabytes of data created every single day, decisions are harder to make than ever. It doesn’t have to be this way. Gain an edge with end-to-end visibility, giving you the confidence to make the right decisions.

Join us to hear about a real-life case study of a major media corporation that needed visibility and context into the cost of work. With good data governance and creative leadership, the ability to quickly connect data across financial systems is now a reality.

Confluence is experiencing a huge and fast evolution. Many new features such as automation, Atlassian Intelligence, whiteboards, and very recently databases are redesigning our daily work processes in Confluence. With Confluence Databases, we started reconsidering our legacy documentation processes and discovered that joining forces with Confluence automation created new governance and workflow capabilities that up to now were just impossible. New smart values, database features, and new capabilities of Atlassian Intelligence enable us to make things more efficient and effective, more automated, and much better governed.

In this session, we show you some variants of documentation processes that we developed with clients. We also look into the near and far future, guessing how these fast-moving evolutions will improve and further revolutionize organization-wide workflows. We also broaden the scope to work processes across all teams and how these too will get revolutionized by the new Confluence.

Key takeaways:

Do not just continue your 'old' processes within new Confluence features: go for a complete redesign

Keep a close eye on the evolution of the Atlassian ecosystem to keep on improving your work management

Automate work processes as much as possible while staying in control

How to make Confluence the foundation for your corporate, digital workplace

The understanding and applications of AI are still developing – and we want to ensure it has a positive impact for all of us. This talk will cover how to reach the ideal AI-assisted workplace and what that entails: Where AI does the heavy lifting with our data, our spreadsheets, and finances, so we can all have some longer coffee breaks.

Key Takeaways:

Understanding the broader impact on integrating AI into our systems

How we can all shape a more human-focused and positive AI-driven future

What Tempo Software is doing with AI to change resource utilization, capacity management, and the way we plan our workflows in the future

ENTERPRISE - Is it a starship? A car rental company? Many people who have tried implementing at the enterprise level can testify that it can be excruciating. But we, at Valiantys, have secret powers that unlock simple ways to transform a "distributed enterprise" into a "connected enterprise". Come discover our approach to using Atlassian Forge as a force multiplier to build the "connected enterprise".

Key takeaways:

Learn how Valiantys and Atlassian have used the special powers of Forge to unlock enterprise implementations.

Hear real-life customer stories.

Learn why you never have to say never with Forge.

Discover how Forge can help go beyond when applications meet their limits.

A year ago, we put a spotlight on Bad Service Management (BSM), an affliction that has plagued enterprises for years.

The best-known cure for BSM? Replace legacy ITSM with Jira Service Management and bring dev, IT and business teams together to deliver exceptional service at high velocity.

See how our recent advancements in AI, incident management, asset management and more can help you stop BSM in its tracks. Hear how industry disruptors like iFood, Brooks Running, Ovo, and 24 Hour Fitness embrace technology to deliver outstanding service fast.

Key takeaways:

Learn how we are reimagining the future of service management with innovations in AI.

See how our advancements in incident management and asset management will help you transform service delivery.

Hear how your peers are transforming their organizations to deliver exceptional service experiences.

Atlassian acquired Loom in November 2023 as a huge statement about distributed work: it’s here to stay and video is going to power it. Loom is the video communication platform for async work, helping 27 million people around the world explain concepts in a visual way, eliminate low value meetings, and scale knowledge — all in a deeply human way.

So, what more can you accomplish with all those meetings off your calendar?

Key takeaways:

Learn how Loom customers eliminate low-value meetings, boost efficiency, and create more effective sales outreach at scale.

See the vision for Loom working seamlessly with you across the Atlassian ecosystem.

Get a first look at brand-new AI-powered workflows for Jira and Confluence.

What if you could apply all the learnings from solving the world’s most complex technical problems towards helping teams in any function achieve breakthrough results? We asked ourselves this question at Atlassian, and the answer is an entirely new way for organizations to plan, collaborate, and learn.

Advancements never happen when everyone does the same thing the same way. Embracing the diversity of thought, ways of working, and ways of being is the new competitive edge. Learn how the innovative approaches of Jira and Confluence break new ground for how work gets done, and how the progress that would otherwise be impossible alone becomes reality. With Atlassian, your best work is waiting.

Key takeaways:

Atlassian is the only project management and collaboration platform that unites all teams.

Jira and Confluence are the only products that truly connect business teams and outcomes to product development.

Organization performance comes from teams working well up, down, and across the organization. Join WPP and explore how networks of teams do great work and what happens when we introduce AI. How can we unleash the potential of teams in the future and what will specialized intelligent team members bring to help teams do their best work?

This session will be a deep dive into how Employee Resource Groups (ERG) were launched at Atlassian and identifies what makes them sustainable. Building community is a top priority for ERGs and this session provides insight into why investing in them is important and how they contribute to the business.

Reception to follow.

Speakers:

Jamal Mazyck, Moderator

Tyler Denbo, ERG Regional Lead AMER Vetlassians

Bianca Bines. ERG Regional Lead AMER Black Atlassian Group

Daniel Lentz, ERG Member Disability Community

Bash is going offsite for Team ’24! This year Bash will be hosted across the street from the Venetian/Palazzo at the XS Nightclub located inside of The Wynn.

Our theme this year is Neon Nights. Be prepared for an unforgettable close out to Team ’24 with many surprises in store!

• Kick off your expo floor experience with a focus on you and your career

Key takeaways:

• Learn about the different types of Atlassian Community Leaders

• Learn what it takes to be a Community Leader

• Learn how being a Community Leader can change your career trajectory

Empower your teams with access to the right data, in the right app, at the right time. Unleash a code-first approach with a pro integration platform designed for technical users to solve the most complex integration challenges. Script, collaborate and connect your Atlassian and third-party apps within an assisted coding environment.

Key Takeaways:

A Jira <-> custom app integration

The benefits of a code-first integration tool

A customer-delivered success story

Learn from Atlassian Creators about how you can reap benefits from championing your favorite products. You've seen them in blogs, on YouTube, and on LinkedIn. Now is your chance to ask #AtlassianCreators your questions! Ever wonder what our day looks like or how we do what we do? Ask away!

Key takeaways:

• How being Creators has benefited our careers

• How to get started on being a Creator

• Different ways you can contribute to the Atlassian Ecosystem

• Community and brand benefits from user-generated content

The best investment you can make is in your team. Improving developer experience yields huge results — from happier and healthier teams to better products for your customers.

Join us to learn how our newest innovations in developer experience and AI reduce friction, save time, and help teams focus on the work they love: building world-class software.

Key takeaways:

Investing in developer experience is the key to improving productivity and velocity.

Integrating AI capabilities like AutoDev and AutoFix into software development practices can help save time, alleviate friction, and improve code quality and reliability.

Have you ever been part of a large cross-functional project that has gone off track? Do you ever get lost working across multiple tools, unsure where to go to find things?

The workplace is becoming ever more chaotic with the number and complexity of the contexts you have to work in scattered across multiple tools and teams. It can be hard to find and prioritise your work and it’s even harder to connect the dots between the work, the goals it contributes towards and the teams doing the work.

Here’s what’s in store for you:

Deep dive into the challenges of collaboration in modern work.

Learn about our new cross-product collaboration experiences.

Gain insights on what makes for healthy and effective collaboration.

This panel discussion is a deep dive into modern portfolio management straight from the source of the experts who are succeeding at it every day.

This session offers a backstage pass for leaders looking for greater operational stability, more effective data, and top tips for sustainable growth to help their decision-making.

Key Takeaways:

Best practices for blending innovation with operational stability

More effective risk management techniques in high-stakes environments

Insights into achieving strategic success and sustainable growth by adapting portfolio management to the dynamics of different industry sectors

Despite over 329 billion gigabytes of data created every single day, decisions are harder to make than ever. It doesn’t have to be this way. Gain an edge with end-to-end visibility, giving you the confidence to make the right decisions.

Join us to hear about a real-life case study of a major media corporation that needed visibility and context into the cost of work. With good data governance and creative leadership, the ability to quickly connect data across financial systems is now a reality.

Successful agile transformation involves aligning your implementation team with organizational pain points and business values. Implementing Jira Align goes beyond a single event; it's an ongoing process. Identify business value and pain points to prioritize desired outcomes, develop a roadmap, and implement a targeted solution effectively.

Key Takeaways:

Learn how Edenred's PayTech optimized their transformation and Jira Align adoption based on value priorities:

Shifted from complaints to prioritized solutions

Identified short and long-term strategic goals, adapting as needed

Aligned tool configuration for high-value outcomes

Confluence databases are here to transform the way your teams visualize workstreams, organize information, and connect all work together. This talk reveals 5 types of tools you can completely replace with Confluence databases – from event management to directories – and practical tips to use databases in your daily workflows right away.

Key takeaways:

Tips from the team that built its functionality to leverage databases right away

Top 5 use cases for business teams and leaders to help streamline knowledge management

Examples of tools you used to pay separately for that can be replaced right away with Confluence databases

Confluence is experiencing a huge and fast evolution. Many new features such as automation, Atlassian Intelligence, whiteboards, and very recently databases are redesigning our daily work processes in Confluence. With Confluence Databases, we started reconsidering our legacy documentation processes and discovered that joining forces with Confluence automation created new governance and workflow capabilities that up to now were just impossible. New smart values, database features, and new capabilities of Atlassian Intelligence enable us to make things more efficient and effective, more automated, and much better governed.

In this session, we show you some variants of documentation processes that we developed with clients. We also look into the near and far future, guessing how these fast-moving evolutions will improve and further revolutionize organization-wide workflows. We also broaden the scope to work processes across all teams and how these too will get revolutionized by the new Confluence.

Key takeaways:

Do not just continue your 'old' processes within new Confluence features: go for a complete redesign

Keep a close eye on the evolution of the Atlassian ecosystem to keep on improving your work management

Automate work processes as much as possible while staying in control

How to make Confluence the foundation for your corporate, digital workplace

Enterprise service management (ESM) goes beyond traditional IT service management (ITSM) to empower various departments, foster collaboration, and drive efficiency across the board. Join us as we explore how ESM can break down silos, increase efficiency (automation is your friend!), and improve the overall service experience. Key Takeaways: - Introduction to enterprise service management (ESM) - Building a service-oriented culture - Breaking down departmental silos - Identifying automation opportunities for better efficiency - Improving the service experiences for internal and external customer

Driven by AI, development speed has hit the gas with no signs of slowing down. Traditional testing approaches have struggled to keep up with an AI world. These testing challenges have caused application quality and user experience to suffer, critical production bugs that put businesses at risk, and customers leaving in search of new products.

Key Takeaways:

Why AI-driven development needs AI-driven testing

Why teams need AI-based testing to accelerate test case management in Jira, speed up creation of stable tests, and boost tester productivity

Which new AI approaches are being developed to address future software challenges

The understanding and applications of AI are still developing – and we want to ensure it has a positive impact for all of us. This talk will cover how to reach the ideal AI-assisted workplace and what that entails: Where AI does the heavy lifting with our data, our spreadsheets, and finances, so we can all have some longer coffee breaks.

Key Takeaways:

Understanding the broader impact on integrating AI into our systems

How we can all shape a more human-focused and positive AI-driven future

What Tempo Software is doing with AI to change resource utilization, capacity management, and the way we plan our workflows in the future

ENTERPRISE - Is it a starship? A car rental company? Many people who have tried implementing at the enterprise level can testify that it can be excruciating. But we, at Valiantys, have secret powers that unlock simple ways to transform a "distributed enterprise" into a "connected enterprise". Come discover our approach to using Atlassian Forge as a force multiplier to build the "connected enterprise".

Key takeaways:

Learn how Valiantys and Atlassian have used the special powers of Forge to unlock enterprise implementations.

Hear real-life customer stories.

Learn why you never have to say never with Forge.

Discover how Forge can help go beyond when applications meet their limits.

A year ago, we put a spotlight on Bad Service Management (BSM), an affliction that has plagued enterprises for years.

The best-known cure for BSM? Replace legacy ITSM with Jira Service Management and bring dev, IT and business teams together to deliver exceptional service at high velocity.

See how our recent advancements in AI, incident management, asset management and more can help you stop BSM in its tracks. Hear how industry disruptors like iFood, Brooks Running, Ovo, and 24 Hour Fitness embrace technology to deliver outstanding service fast.

Key takeaways:

Learn how we are reimagining the future of service management with innovations in AI.

See how our advancements in incident management and asset management will help you transform service delivery.

Hear how your peers are transforming their organizations to deliver exceptional service experiences.

Atlassian acquired Loom in November 2023 as a huge statement about distributed work: it’s here to stay and video is going to power it. Loom is the video communication platform for async work, helping 27 million people around the world explain concepts in a visual way, eliminate low value meetings, and scale knowledge — all in a deeply human way.

So, what more can you accomplish with all those meetings off your calendar?

Key takeaways:

Learn how Loom customers eliminate low-value meetings, boost efficiency, and create more effective sales outreach at scale.

See the vision for Loom working seamlessly with you across the Atlassian ecosystem.

Get a first look at brand-new AI-powered workflows for Jira and Confluence.

This session will be a deep dive into how Employee Resource Groups (ERG) were launched at Atlassian and identifies what makes them sustainable. Building community is a top priority for ERGs and this session provides insight into why investing in them is important and how they contribute to the business.

Reception to follow.

Speakers:

Jamal Mazyck, Moderator

Tyler Denbo, ERG Regional Lead AMER Vetlassians

Bianca Bines. ERG Regional Lead AMER Black Atlassian Group

Daniel Lentz, ERG Member Disability Community

What if you could apply all the learnings from solving the world’s most complex technical problems towards helping teams in any function achieve breakthrough results? We asked ourselves this question at Atlassian, and the answer is an entirely new way for organizations to plan, collaborate, and learn.

Advancements never happen when everyone does the same thing the same way. Embracing the diversity of thought, ways of working, and ways of being is the new competitive edge. Learn how the innovative approaches of Jira and Confluence break new ground for how work gets done, and how the progress that would otherwise be impossible alone becomes reality. With Atlassian, your best work is waiting.

Key takeaways:

Atlassian is the only project management and collaboration platform that unites all teams.

Jira and Confluence are the only products that truly connect business teams and outcomes to product development.

Organization performance comes from teams working well up, down, and across the organization. Join WPP and explore how networks of teams do great work and what happens when we introduce AI. How can we unleash the potential of teams in the future and what will specialized intelligent team members bring to help teams do their best work?

Bash is going offsite for Team ’24! This year Bash will be hosted across the street from the Venetian/Palazzo at the XS Nightclub located inside of The Wynn.

Our theme this year is Neon Nights. Be prepared for an unforgettable close out to Team ’24 with many surprises in store!
